description:
Resuming the fine tradition of 'Phil's Data Beers' with a... SELECT few ;) (sorry, couldn't resist...), an informal social evening in the pub to celebrate a great year of data meetups!

All welcome, please let us know if you're coming by RSVP'ing to this meetup as we'll try and book space in a pub.

We're aiming for The Famous Royal Navy Volunteer on King Street. We couldn't get a table reservation, but they are open for walk-ins, so we'll try to grab space as it becomes available. Keep an eye on this meetup event for updates and message Dom if you'd like a contact number to help locate us!

If you're planning to come and haven't joined us previously, I'll have a 'Data Bristol' meetup sign out on a table/please message me or post in the discussion for this meetup with any questions.

Update 11/12/2022: We've teamed up with the great peeps from PyData now so it will be a joint social. If you're interested in their meetup is: https://www.meetup.com/pydata-bristol/events/290220404/ (Just for info, you only need to sign up via one group!)
title: Christmas Data Beers
